description: Sharply priced, immaculate 3 bdrm plus rec room(could be 4th bdrm) 4 bathroom townhome  with a renovated kitchen, gleaming quartz counters,  stylish ceramic backsplash, all upgraded appliances, and  engineered hardwood floors!! Upstairs, the primary suite fits all your furniture, the walk-in closet has room for his and her wardrobes plus there are  2 more generous bedrooms and convenient laundry. The accessible  lower level offers a great option for out of town guests/family  w/ full bath + 4th bedroom/sitting area and direct  access to your private fenced yard ideal for kids, pets or entertaining ! A double garage plus extended driveway provides parking for 4 vehicles in an ultraconvenient location-walk to schools, Costco and all of Fremont!
